column.name: message
column.value: Welcome to TibeolAuto car dealership system, to further use the program, you don't need to fully enter the action name, just enter the beginning of the name, different from others, so the program can determine your thought process.

column.name: message
column.value: What would you like to do?: - Register - Log in

column.name: message
column.value: Enter the reason for the refusal, this message will be sent to the user (you can leave it blank and press Enter):

column.name: message
column.value: Enter your order text:

column.name: message
column.value: Return to previous page

column.name: message
column.value: This id was not found in the database, try again or perform another action

column.name: message
column.value: Choose your next action:

column.name: message
column.value: Enter your username (between 8 and 30 characters):

column.name: message
column.value: An error occurred, returning to previous action

column.name: message
column.value: A user with this name already exists, try again

column.name: message
column.value: Exiting the system

column.name: message
column.value: Enter your password (between 8 and 50 characters):

column.name: message
column.value: Enter your contact phone number:

column.name: message
column.value: It is recommended to check new messages, the number of received messages:

column.name: message
column.value: To successfully register, some data is required. Enter your status: | Administrator | Manager | Client

column.name: message
column.value: You have moved to the car registration page, to stop the action, enter 'Back'

column.name: message
column.value: Are you sure you want to shut down the program? This will result in the loss of all data! (Yes/No)

column.name: message
column.value: Are you sure you want to log out of your account? (Yes/No)

column.name: message
column.value: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This will result in the loss of all your data! (Yes/No)

column.name: message
column.value: Invalid input, please check the correctness of the data and try again

column.name: message
column.value: Invalid password, please try again

column.name: message
column.value: The user was not found in the system, please check the input data or register with a new name

column.name: message
column.value: System started
